definitions.title: interrog. adv.
definitions.body: when? (A r. matay; As. mati: in NH and Aram. with the interrog. [[אַי]], [[אֵימָתִי]], [[אֵימָת]], 0ematy), in OT only of future time:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: alone, †Ge 30:30 [[מָתַי אעשׂה גם אנכי]] [[לביתי]] when shall I also do, etc.? Am 8:5, Ps 41:6, Ps 42:3, Ps 94:8, Ps 101:2, Ps 119:82, Ps 119:84, Pr 6:9 b, Pr 23:35, Job 7:4 [[מָתַי אָקוּם]], Ne 2:6.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עַד־מָתַי]] until when? how long? sq. impf. Ex 10:7 [[עד מתי יהיה זה לנו למוקשׁ]], 1Sa 1:14, Je 4:14, Je 4:21, Ps 74:10, Ps 82:2, Ps 94:3, Pr 1:22 +, sq. ptcp.1Sa 16:1, 1Ki 18:21 [[עַד־מָתַי אַתֶּם פּׂסְחִים עַל־שְׁתֵּי הַסְּעִפִּים]], sq. pf. † Ex 10:3, Ps 80:5; [[עַד מָתַי לאׁ]] † 2Sa 2:26, Ho 8:5, Zec 1:12; alone, Is 6:11 [[וׇאׂמַר עַד־מָתַי אֲדׂנׇי]], Hb Hab 2:6 [[הוֹי הַמַּרְבֶּה לאׁ־לוֹ עַד־מָתַי]]; with an aposiop., Ps 6:4 [[עַד־מָתָָי]] ´[[וְאַתָּה י]], Ps 90:13.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[אַחֲרֵי מָתַי עוֹד]], after how long yet? †Je 13:27.
